data.about: Tom Sawyer is a director of brand marketing, with experience managing global teams and multi-million-dollar campaigns. His background in brand strategy, visual design, and account management inform his mindful but competitive approach. Tom is fueled by his passion for understanding the nuances of cross-cultural advertising. He considers himself a ‘forever student,’ eager to both build on her academic foundations in psychology and sociology and stay in tune with the latest digital marketing strategies through continued coursework.
